event.description: Jimmy Rollins singles on a fly ball to left fielder Fernando Tatis.
Shane Victorino flies out to center fielder Carlos Beltran.
Chase Utley grounds out, second baseman Luis Castillo to first baseman Carlos Delgado. Jimmy Rollins to 2nd.
Ryan Howard doubles (6) on a fly ball to left fielder Fernando Tatis. Jimmy Rollins scores.
Jayson Werth singles on a sharp ground ball to left fielder Fernando Tatis. Ryan Howard to 3rd.
Raul Ibanez grounds out to first baseman Carlos Delgado.
Pedro Feliz singles on a ground ball to center fielder Carlos Beltran.
Carlos Ruiz grounds into a double play, third baseman David Wright to second baseman Luis Castillo to first baseman Carlos Delgado. Pedro Feliz out at 2nd.
Jamie Moyer walks.
Jimmy Rollins flies out to center fielder Carlos Beltran.
Shane Victorino flies out to left fielder Fernando Tatis.
Chase Utley lines out to left fielder Fernando Tatis.
Ryan Howard grounds out, shortstop Jose Reyes to first baseman Carlos Delgado.
Jayson Werth singles on a line drive to center fielder Carlos Beltran.
With Raul Ibanez batting, Jayson Werth steals (3) 2nd base.
Raul Ibanez singles on a sharp ground ball to right fielder Gary Sheffield. Jayson Werth scores.
Pedro Feliz grounds into a force out, shortstop Jose Reyes to second baseman Luis Castillo. Raul Ibanez out at 2nd. Pedro Feliz to 1st.
Carlos Ruiz grounds into a double play, second baseman Luis Castillo to shortstop Jose Reyes to first baseman Carlos Delgado. Pedro Feliz out at 2nd.
J. A. Happ grounds out, first baseman Carlos Delgado to pitcher Mike Pelfrey.
Jimmy Rollins grounds out, second baseman Luis Castillo to first baseman Carlos Delgado.
Shane Victorino grounds out, second baseman Luis Castillo to first baseman Carlos Delgado.
Chase Utley pops out to shortstop Jose Reyes.
Ryan Howard homers (6) on a fly ball to right center field.
Jayson Werth doubles (8) on a sharp ground ball to left fielder Fernando Tatis.
Raul Ibanez grounds out, first baseman Carlos Delgado to pitcher Mike Pelfrey. Jayson Werth to 3rd.
Pedro Feliz grounds out, second baseman Luis Castillo to first baseman Carlos Delgado.
Carlos Ruiz flies out to left fielder Fernando Tatis.
Offensive Substitution: Pinch-hitter Greg Dobbs replaces J. A. Happ.
Greg Dobbs flies out to right fielder Gary Sheffield.
Jimmy Rollins grounds out, first baseman Carlos Delgado to pitcher Mike Pelfrey.
Pitching Change: Pedro Feliciano replaces Mike Pelfrey, batting 6th, replacing right fielder Gary Sheffield.
Defensive Substitution: Ryan Church replaces pitcher Mike Pelfrey, batting 9th, playing right field.
Shane Victorino singles on a sharp ground ball to third baseman David Wright.
Chase Utley grounds out ,second baseman Luis Castillo to first baseman Carlos Delgado . Shane Victorino advances to 2nd, on an interference error by shortstop Jose Reyes.
New York Mets Manager Jerry Manuel ejected by 1B umpire Bill Welke.
Ryan Howard grounds out, second baseman Luis Castillo to first baseman Carlos Delgado. Shane Victorino to 3rd.
Jayson Werth homers (5) on a fly ball to left field. Shane Victorino scores.
Raul Ibanez grounds out, shortstop Jose Reyes to first baseman Carlos Delgado.
Pitching Change: Francisco Rodriguez replaces Pedro Feliciano, batting 6th.
Omir Santos remains in the game as the catcher.
Pedro Feliz flies out to left fielder Fernando Tatis.
Offensive Substitution: Pinch-hitter Miguel Cairo replaces Carlos Ruiz.
Miguel Cairo grounds out, shortstop Jose Reyes to first baseman Carlos Delgado.
Offensive Substitution: Pinch-hitter Matt Stairs replaces Jack Taschner.
Matt Stairs walks.
With Jimmy Rollins batting, Matt Stairs advances to 2nd on defensive indifference.
Jimmy Rollins pops out to second baseman Luis Castillo.
Jose Reyes strikes out swinging.
Luis Castillo walks.
With Carlos Beltran batting, Luis Castillo steals (1) 2nd base.
Carlos Beltran homers (5) on a fly ball to left field. Luis Castillo scores.
Carlos Delgado doubles (5) on a sharp line drive to right fielder Jayson Werth.
David Wright homers (3) on a fly ball to center field. Carlos Delgado scores.
Gary Sheffield walks.
Fernando Tatis flies out to center fielder Shane Victorino.
Ramon Castro grounds out, shortstop Jimmy Rollins to first baseman Ryan Howard.
Mike Pelfrey grounds out, shortstop Jimmy Rollins to first baseman Ryan Howard.

Carlos Delgado hit by pitch.
David Wright singles on a ground ball to center fielder Shane Victorino. Carlos Delgado to 2nd.
Gary Sheffield pops out to second baseman Chase Utley on the infield fly rule.
Fernando Tatis singles on a sharp ground ball to shortstop Jimmy Rollins. Carlos Delgado to 3rd. David Wright to 2nd.
Ramon Castro doubles (3) on a fly ball to center fielder Shane Victorino. Carlos Delgado scores. David Wright scores. Fernando Tatis to 3rd.
Pitching Change: J. A. Happ replaces Jamie Moyer, batting 9th.
Mike Pelfrey grounds out, shortstop Jimmy Rollins to first baseman Ryan Howard.
Jose Reyes called out on strikes.
